required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Dose Escalation and Food Effect Study of SKLB1028 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Centre, Single-Administration, Dose-Escalation Study and A Single-Centre, Randomized, Open-Label, Two-cycle Crossover Food Effect Study of SKLB1028 in Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to explore the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics (PK) of single ascending oral doses of SKLB1028 in healthy subjects. This study has also explored the effect of food on the PK of SKLB1028.

detailed_description.textblock: The study was divided into 2 parts. Part 1(Dose Escalation) included 2 cohorts (Cohort 1 and Cohort 2) and subjects received a single oral dose of SKLB1028 50 or 100 mg on Day 1. In Part 2 (Food Effect) included 2 cohorts (Cohort A and Cohort B), subjects received a single oral dose of SKLB1028 150 mg in a fasting and a fed state, with a 10-day washout period between the 2 doses.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events (TEAEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period, with an average of 10 days.
primary_outcome.description: TEAEs were assessed by CTCAE v5.0 in Part 1

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) of SKLB1028 in Part 2
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to last quantifiable concentration (AUC0-last) of SKLB1028 in Part 2
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to infinity (AUCinf) of SKLB1028 in Part 2
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

primary_outcome.measure: Time to Cmax (Tmax) of SKLB1028 in Part 2
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

primary_outcome.measure: Terminal-elimination half-life (T1/2) of SKLB1028 in Part 2
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of distribution (Vz/F) of SKLB1028 in Part 2
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent clearance (CLz/F) of SKLB1028 in Part 2
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum plasma concentration ( Cmax) of SKLB1028 in Part 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to last quantifiable concentration (AUC0-last) of SKLB1028 in Part 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to infinity (AUCinf) of SKLB1028 in Part 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Cmax (Tmax) of SKLB1028 in Part 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal-elimination half-life (T1/2) of SKLB1028 in Part 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of distribution (Vz/F) of SKLB1028 in Part 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent Clearance (CLz/F) of SKLB1028 in Part 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours post-dose
Throughout the study period, with an average of 20 days
secondary_outcome.description: TEAEs were assessed by CTCAE v5.0 in Part 2

arm_group.arm_group_label: Dose Escalation Cohort 1: single oral dose of SKLB1028
arm_group.description: Eligible subjects received a single dose of SKLB1028 50 mg on Day 1.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Dose Escalation Cohort 2: single oral dose of SKLB1028
arm_group.description: Eligible subjects received a single dose of SKLB1028 100 mg on Day 1.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Food Effect Cohort A: SKLB1028, fasted dosing followed by fed dosing
arm_group.description: Eligible subjects received a single dose of SKLB1028 150 mg on Day 1 in a fasting state, and a single dose of SKLB1028 150 mg on Day 11 in a fed state, with a 10-day washout period between the 2 doses.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Food Effect Cohort B: SKLB1028, fed dosing followed by fasted dosing
arm_group.description: Eligible subjects received a single dose of SKLB1028 150 mg on Day 4 in a fed state, and a single dose of SKLB1028 150 mg on Day 14 in a fasting state, with a 10-day washout period between the 2 doses.

intervention.arm_group_label: Dose Escalation Cohort 1: single oral dose of SKLB1028
Dose Escalation Cohort 2: single oral dose of SKLB1028
Food Effect Cohort A: SKLB1028, fasted dosing followed by fed dosing

facility.name: Beijing Friendship Hospital, Capital Medical University
